idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Chords
playNote([53, 57, 60, 64], beats = 1) # Fmaj7 (low)
rest(0.7)
playNote([55, 59, 62], beats = 1)         # G major
rest(0.7)
playNote([52, 55, 59, 62], beats = 1)     # Em7
rest(0.7)
playNote([53, 57, 60], beats = 1)         # F major (tight voicing)
rest(0.7)
# Optional: repeat for looping effect
for i in range(1, 3):
    rest(0.7)
    playNote([53, 57, 60, 64], beats = 1)
    rest(0.7)
    playNote([55, 59, 62], beats = 1)
    rest(0.7)
    playNote([52, 55, 59, 62], beats = 1)
    rest(0.7)
    playNote([53, 57, 60], beats = 1)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:

rest(1.00)
playNote(43, beats = 1)   # G1 (G major root)
rest(1.50)
playNote(40, beats = 1)   # E1 (Em7 root)
rest(1.25)
playNote(41, beats = 1)   # F1 (F major root)
rest(1.50)
playNote(45, beats = 1)   # A1 (Fmaj7 color tone)
rest(0.75)
playNote(47, beats = 1)   # B1 (leading tone to C)
